Demo_Main_01.text: {blip:2}Testing, testing...{p:500} One, two, three...{p:500} Is this thing on?

Demo_Main_01.name: Oldbag
Demo_Main_01.text: {addEvidence:badge}{blip:1}{flash}{showCharacter}{sprite:Oldbag["Embarrassed"]}Welcome to the Ace Attorney Engine demo!

Demo_Main_01.name: Oldbag
Demo_Main_01.text: In this demo, I'll be showing you some of the features of the Ace Attorney Engine.{topicUnlock:showcase}{topicUnlock:gameOverTest}{sectionEnd}

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Normal"]}We can change text colors like {color:red}red{color:white}, {color:lime}green{color:white}, or {color:lightblue}blue{color:white}.

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Smirking"]}We can also add pauses... {p:500} for dramatic effect.

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Embarrassed"]}And we can trigger animations! {sprite:Oldbag["Shocked"]}{flash}{playSound:wham} WHAM! {p:1000}{sprite:Oldbag["Smirking"]} Did you see that?

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {startBGM:investigation}Now playing some investigation music... {p:2000} And stopping it.{stopBGM}

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: You can also add evidence to your inventory during dialogue.
{addEvidence:charm,true}{color:lightblue}{blip:4}Blue Badger's Charm added to the court record.{color:white}{p:1000}{blip:1}

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {textSpeed:20}{sprite:Oldbag["Angry"]}Are you even listening to me? Today's youth doesn't care about anything.{skip:0}

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {textSpeed:20}You only want the instant gratification, without patience and perseverance.{skip:0}

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Normal"]}...{p:100}Anyway, let's move on to the next part of the demo.

Demo_showcase_2.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase_2.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Normal"]}This is the second section! We jumped here.

Demo_showcase_2.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase_2.text: Now, let's demonstrate conditional jumps based on game state.

Section_FirstMeeting.name: Oldbag
Section_FirstMeeting.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Embarrassed"]}Nice to meet you for the first time!{setState:hasMetOldbag,true}

Demo_evidence_badge.name: Oldbag
Demo_evidence_badge.text: {playSound:wham}{flash}{sprite:Oldbag["Shocked"]}My badge! {p:500}{sprite:Oldbag["Angry"]}Wait, why do you have that? Are you impersonating an officer?{sectionEnd}

Demo_evidence_default.name: Oldbag
Demo_evidence_default.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Normal"]}I don't know what that is, and I don't care.{sectionEnd}

Demo_Examine_Sign.name: Phoenix
Demo_Examine_Sign.text: There's a sign here with some kanji on it. 'Seiri'... something?

Demo_Examine_Sign.name: Oldbag
Demo_Examine_Sign.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Smirking"]}It says 'Seiri Seiton', you uncultured cactus! It means 'keeping things tidy and in order'.

Demo_Examine_Sign.name: Phoenix
Demo_Examine_Sign.text: {color:lightblue}(I guess my desk doesn't exactly fit that description...){color:white}

Demo_Examine_Sign.name: Oldbag
Demo_Examine_Sign.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Angry"]}Look at this place! It's a mess! The youth today have no respect for order!{sectionEnd}

Demo_Examine_Ladder.name: Phoenix
Demo_Examine_Ladder.text: Look at that ladder over there.

Demo_Examine_Ladder.name: Oldbag
Demo_Examine_Ladder.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Angry"]}Hold your horses! That is NOT a ladder! It's a "step-ladder"!

Demo_Examine_Ladder.name: Phoenix
Demo_Examine_Ladder.text: So? What's the difference? You need to stop judging things based on narrow-minded cultural assumptions.

Demo_Examine_Ladder.name: Oldbag
Demo_Examine_Ladder.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Smirking"]}Hmph. Young people these days... A step-ladder stands on its own, unlike a ladder which needs support!{sectionEnd}

Demo_gameOverTest.name: Oldbag
Demo_gameOverTest.text: {showLifeBar:5}{sprite:Oldbag["Angry"]}This is a test of the game over feature. Choosing the wrong option will reduce your life points!{p:1000}{hideLifeBar}{sectionEnd}

Demo_option_1.name: Oldbag
Demo_option_1.text: {showLifeBar}{sprite:Oldbag["Smirking"]}You picked the first option! Good choice. No penalty for you.{p:1000}{hideLifeBar}{sectionEnd}

Demo_option_2.name: Oldbag
Demo_option_2.text: {showLifeBar:10}{sprite:Oldbag["Angry"]}You picked the second option! What were you thinking?!{playSound:wham}{flash}{lifeMod:-10}

Demo_option_2.name: Oldbag
Demo_option_2.text: That's what you get for being foolish!{p:1000}{hideLifeBar}{sectionEnd}

Demo_option_3.name: Oldbag
Demo_option_3.text: {showLifeBar:2}{sprite:Oldbag["Embarrassed"]}You picked the third option! This triggers a smaller penalty.{playSound:wham}{flash}{lifeMod:-2}

BadEnding_01.name: System
BadEnding_01.text: You have listed your last valid argument...{endGame}
